A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Sorry. but TLJ just failed epic. The whole base story can be told in five words: Running away in slow motion.
That's too less for 2 1/2 hours. 
Many parts were executed very poorly story wise. 
The potential of many characters was wasted that way and/or the way how they were portrayed was very disappointing.
However\, there are indeed some interesting twists.
